result.name: Table IV.1. Major FCL Activities to Educate FBCOs about Charitable Choice

row1.item: Quarterly workshops, conferences, technical assistance (TA), respond to inquiries. Materials distributed at events, and general inquiries. Website links to guidance information.

row2.item: Not major current emphasis. Annual partnerships conference, respond to inquiries.

row3.item: Regional roundtables and workshops, individual TA, respond to inquiries. RFPs for Compassion Florida grants.

row4.item: Not major current emphasis. Individual TA, respond to inquiries.

row5.item: RFP orientation sessions (cover some aspects of regulations), respond to inquiries.

row6.item: Not major current emphasis. Respond to inquiries, federal grants conference (2007).

row7.item: Workshops, presentations, conference calls, webinar sessions, respond to inquiries, and TA to grantees and prospective applicants. Materials distributed at events, TA sessions. Website links to guidance materials.

row8.item: Individual TA, respond to inquiries, presentations at issue-focused conferences. Technical Assistance Handbook. Website links to guidance materials.
